name: @lgcyaxi/oh-my-claude
description: Multi-agent orchestration plugin for Claude Code with multi-provider support

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts src/cli.ts --outdir dist --target node
scripts.build:mcp: bun build src/mcp/background-agent-server/server.ts --outdir dist/mcp --target node && bun run scripts/copy-wasm.ts
scripts.build:hooks: bun build src/hooks/comment-checker.ts src/hooks/todo-continuation.ts src/hooks/task-notification.ts src/hooks/task-tracker.ts src/hooks/memory-awareness.ts src/hooks/session-logger.ts src/hooks/context-memory.ts src/hooks/preference-awareness.ts --outdir dist/hooks --target node
scripts.build:all: bun run build && bun run build:mcp && bun run build:hooks && bun run build:statusline && bun run build:proxy
scripts.install-local: bun run build:all && bun run src/cli.ts install
scripts.menubar:dev: cd apps/menubar && bun run tauri dev
scripts.menubar:build: cd apps/menubar && bun run tauri build
